h3.div: School has changed drastically in the past few weeks and is likely to keep shifting over the next few months. We will do our best to keep this site up to date with the information our community needs to know.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Enjoy Spring Break - a video greeting to all of you, from all of us!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

h2.div: What is our school during dismissal?

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Please read this Document outlining what school will be for the remainder of this school year. The staff and I hope you find it helpful. One component we did not include, but is equally as important is your wellbeing. If at any time school is negatively impacting your wellbeing, please reach out to us. You are not alone and we will listen with no judgement. As my wife keeps reminding me, "you need to put on your oxygen mask on first in order to help others."
I feel lucky to be working with all of you during this unprecedented time in our history.

p.em: Aaron using dismissal time well. Fixing lights and ceiling tiles!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.a: Click here for information on WCSU's response to the ongoing situation.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Guidance Counselor: Tom Hudak "Mr. H" thudak@marlboroschool.net

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-zQtlcf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
